column4: I recently tried to do multiple monitors on my laptop, however, when I unplugged the external monitor, I'm stuck with 1024x768 resolution, and can't go higher. I have two black bars on the sides of my screen, indicating an improper aspect ratio? Any ideas how to fix this?
edit your xorg.conf file and remove the virtual section
it's enough to just restart X after that right, don't need to reboot?
